content: Indeed, Middle Eastern weddings are known for their lively and joyous celebration, making them a memorable experience. The festivities usually last for several days, with different ceremonies like henna night, pre-wedding parties, and the actual wedding ceremony. Traditional dances like the dabke are often performed during weddings, making them a beautiful and exciting cultural experience to witness. If you ever get the chance to attend one, I'm sure you'll cherish the experience forever.
